ing: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and chopped
1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes, cut in thin strips
des: "A delicious, satisfying, low-calorie side dish for those who are dieting and can do without rice or potatoes."
ins: Heat olive oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat. Stir in garlic and chile pepper; cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Stir in broccoli; cook 1 minute. Add kale, and cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes. Pour in lime juice, and season with salt to taste. Toss well.
